Bring Your Kids to See Santa With Us This Year

 Dec 1, 2017

Dec 1, 2017

One of the frustrations our families have encountered the last couple of years during the holiday season is waiting in long lines to see Santa at the mall and paying a lot for pictures once we got the chance. 

That’s why we’ve decided to have Santa come to us this year, and you’re invited to join us when he does. On December 11 from 5 p.m. to 8 p.m., bring your kids to see Santa with us at the Gateway Condominiums at 5 S. 500 West 5th Floor here in Salt Lake City. 

We’ll be serving hot chocolate and treats, and you’ll also have the chance to snap a few photos before checking out the lights downtown. We’ll have our own camera as well, so if you don’t have one, we can take pictures for you and email them to you.

Click Here to View a Map With Directions

Click Here to View Our Save-the-Date!

“Skip the long lines and expensive photos this year.”

We’re very excited to have all of our friends and family join us, and we’d love it if you came too. If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out to us. Until then, happy holidays!

About the CRA Team

Colemere Realty Associates, LLC
9661 S 700 E
Sandy, UT 84070
(801) 272-8192
info@colemererealty.com
colemererealty.com

As a third generation, family-owned and operated real estate company, Colemere Realty Associates has a long history of working for the success of our clients. Each member of our team is focused on providing the expertise of 3 generations in the business. We know that a real estate transaction can be very challenging which is why achieving your satisfaction is our top priority.

As your REALTOR®, we are committed to your success in the purchase and sale of your home, and we promise you the full support, experience, and expertise of our team.

    “We had a property with raw land which, is a super big challenge in Salt Lake City. I didn’t want to put a lien on my house or anything so Scott helped me with any challenges I had with getting that land. He actually fought for my property. When it came down to offers, he w...

    Show More

    “We had a property with raw land which, is a super big challenge in Salt Lake City. I didn’t want to put a lien on my house or anything so Scott helped me with any challenges I had with getting that land. He actually fought for my property. When it came down to offers, he was very quick in getting those back and doing any addendums that I needed. The reason I got the property was because he fought for me. I think without him I probably wouldn’t have gotten the property. I needed someone that would do round the clock addendums and legal paperwork, and he was willing to do that for me. So, that made him stand out in the realty world for me.”

    Show Less

    - Michael Corbet
